entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @SenSchumer There is no opposition party in this country. "The bill permits bailed out companies to lay off up to 10% of their workforce over the next six months, with no restrictions thereafter." And the horse you rode in on, Chuck.👎  https://t.co/INOp40E4Re
